file.name: openapi.yaml
file.content:
openapi: 3.0.0
info:
  title: Petstore API
  version: 1.0.0
  description: description
security: []

paths:

  /v1/pets/{petId}:
    get:
      operationId: getPet
      parameters:
      - name: petId
        in: path
        required: true
        schema:
          type: string
      responses:
        '200':
          description: Details of the requested pet.
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/Pet'

        '400':
          description: Bad Request.
        '500': 
          description: Internal Server Error.

components:

  schemas:
    Pet:
      type: object
      required:
        -  id
      properties:
        name:
          type: string
        id:
          type: string
          format: uuid
        status:
          type: string
          enum: string

Error: unmarshal: yaml: line 1: cannot unmarshal !!str into *jsonschema.Enum
